ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: A set of functions to calculate sample size for two-sample difference in means tests. Does adjustments for either nonadherence or variability that comes from using data to estimate parameters.
A set of functions to calculate sample size for two-sample difference in means tests. Does adjustments for either nonadherence or variability that comes from using data to estimate parameters.

name: r-ssanv
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ssanv
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ssanv_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ssanv/ssanv_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 4dea3fefe2d9da6a3020d19dea2ebc6634df38cbce0415fb16b0d4fe5551449d

build:
  number: 1006
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ssanv')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ssanv')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=ssanv
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: A set of functions to calculate sample size for two-sample difference in means tests.
    Does adjustments for either nonadherence or variability that comes from using data
    to estimate parameters.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
